titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Montauk Fire Insurance Company insurance policy to Christopher Jacobson 1977.512
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:12:11 +0000.

did.unittitle: Montauk Fire Insurance Company insurance policy to Christopher Jacobson

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Montauk Fire Insurance Company (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)

did.abstract: Insurance policy issued by the Montauk Fire Insurance Company of Brooklyn to Christopher Jacobson for a home in the Brooklyn neighborhood of Gravesend. It is dated October 4, 1887.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Montauk Fire Insurance Company insurance policy to Christopher Jacobson, 1977.512, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
